document.heading: Small Business Stabilization and Job Creation Strategy Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-159, the “Small Business Stabilization and Job Creation Strategy Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-457, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 2, 2010, and March 2, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 25, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-350 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-159 became effective on May 27, 2010.
